title: Amazon Essentials Women's Mid-Rise Stretch Pull-On Jegging (Available in Plus Size)
description: SKINNY FIT: Snug fit through hip, thigh, and leg. Mid rise, sits below the natural waist.
SUPER STRETCH DENIM: Super soft and stretchy denim that keeps its shape for all-day comfort and fit, while still offering an authentic denim look.
YOUR EVERDAY JEGGING: Wear these jeggings just like your favorite pair of jeans with the extra comfort and ease. This slim and flattering silhouette allows for endless styling options.

DETAILS: Wide elastic pull-on waistband for extra comfort and front and back pockets, belt loops, and faux fly give the look and function of true denim. All denim is unique and will vary in color due to wash, finish, and dye.
INSEAM: Offered in 3 lengths - Short 27", Regular 29", & Long 31" each with a 5" leg opening on US size 6.

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
